title: Pan-fried Chicken Livers with Garlic & Shallots
directions: Heat the oil in a saucepan over a medium heat. Add the shallot and garlic and fry until the onion softens.
Season the chicken liver, then add it to the pan and fry 3-4 minutes until cooked through and browned on all sides.
Sprinkle over the lemon juice, then the parsley and thyme. Serve immediately.
ingredients: 120g chicken livers, cut into bite-sized pieces
